devices_included: Tablet; Any screen device; Desktop computer; Laptop
use_cases_desc:
Application remains abstract, some kind of document review.

Focus on visual links, and strategies to manage those.
Includes variety of links:
- document links
- display links
- annotation links
evaluation: User study (qualitative); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
contribution_desc: Visual links between multiple screens/views on different levels, linking content, documents, devices. Strategies to make these visualisations work. Explicit links.
